recycling_robot.setting: Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact. The robot has two grippers and thus the robot can hold two objects at most simultaneously.

recycling_bin.setting: This bin is on the floor used for recycling items.

state_description.type: the type of the robot or object, e.g., robot, desk, glass, recycling bin
state_description.position: the 3D position of the robot or object, e.g., [4.0, 6.0, -2.0]
state_description.size: the size of the robot or object, e.g., size of a glass is 0.2
state_description.gripper_content: the content in the gripper of the robot. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.setting: the role setting of the robot or object, e.g., 'Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact.'
state_description.gripper_contact_range: the range of robot gripper contact, e.g., 1.0
state_description.content: the content in the corresponding object. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.glass_on_desk: whether the glass on the desk or not, e.g., True or False
